title: Developers experience faster inner-loop via improved incremental build and evaluations
body:
# Background
Parent of user stories that tackle different incremental build optimization opportunities.

# User Stories
- [x] #8422

# Justification
- Aligns to PERF optimization and modernization themes and key results.

nodes.body:
This isn't strictly "Incremental Build" but it is important to its investigation.
When enabling logging (/fl or /bl), it adds a huge overhead to the total build time.  I measured as much as 25% increase on normal builds and probably more for incremental builds.
Change milestone to align with themesof.net tracking
Targeted children were closed, thus closing epic.
